data.title: Batak Pro Reaction Game - Best Inflatable Funfair & Exhibition Game Hire UK service in Sheffield, Rotherham, Doncaster, Leeds, Manchester, Derby, Birmingham, Hull
data.meta_description: Batak Pro Reaction Game is one of the wide range of products available from DB Entertainment events experts. Contact us today!
data.text:
BATAK Pro improves reaction, hand-eye coordination and stamina by enabling users to train under simulated 'sports like' conditions, while also providing an element of fun and competition. As soon as the button lights up, press it as quickly as you can and move onto the next one.

To add some real competition why not add a leader board to keep top scores for your whole event. A great idea for competitions at trade shows and exhibition stands.

The Batak Pro is one of our most popular exhibition games and exhibition attractions. It will really make your exhibition stand event the envy of all other exhibitors. It is a quick-moving game that allows a lot of players to participate in a short amount of time – importantly this means more people for your staff to interact with, making the Batak Pro one of the best exhibitions stand ideas.

The Batak Pro was booked by a professional Rugby team for an event held at Leeds arena. It was to not only to be used in hand-eye co-ordination training but also to attract members of the public. At a corporate party in Old Trafford Manchester, the game was used to have an overall winner for the night with a prize at the end.

Our Batak Pro is an exhibition game that has a lot of impact when branded. Whether for companies, logos, brands or product launches, using the batak pro for business launches has proven successful time and time again.

For more information or to put together a package of items, please call our office on 0114 345 0135 or fill our enquiry page out by clicking here.

In terms of putting other items together with Batak Pro, other games that have been hired include Atari Pong, Virtual Bowling and Home Stretch Horse Racing.

Location – Batak Pro Hire - From our Base in Rotherham/ Sheffield, we are ideally placed next to the major motorway networks including the A1, M1 and M18. This allows us to cover the whole of the UK, including the North East of England and especially South Yorkshire. West Yorkshire and Greater Manchester are just on our Doorstep and for larger packages, we regularly deliver our services and equipment to many areas including London, Birmingham and Wales to name a few.

What’s included with Batak Pro hire –

Set up & installed on site by our specialist team

Full operational tutorial and instructions

Telephone support and guidance

Collection and removal from site – delivery charges may apply

Optional in-house branding available

No power, no problem. We provide generators to allow for games to be set up where you want them.

BATAK Pro Configuration

With 12 'visually bright' LED numbered targets put under the control of a dedicated micro-computer.

Depending on the selected program, the targets may be lit up in random or repetitive ways.

Hits and misses are timed and scored on two centrally located LED displays.

Verbal instructions are issued to the participating player during the exercise as appropriate (e.g. "Get Ready"..."Go"..."Time Out"...etc.)

Dimensions Free Standing - 2080(w) x 950(d) x 1950(h)

Batak Hire with DB Entertainment
